long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Code once, run anywhere.
Experience the power of seamless code sharing

Ogre is a simple tool to share code and the computational environment where it was designed

The ogre.run extension provides software developers with a simple way to create coding environments directly from a git repository web page, e.g., GitHub and GitLab.
